docs.snippet: The Washington Redskins have been trying to protect the right knee of Robert Griffin III, who said he was willing to take things slow to play in the season opener....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Washington Redskins have been trying to protect the right knee of Robert Griffin III, who said he was willing to take things slow to play in the season opener.
docs.abstract: Washington Redskins, mindful of quarterback Robert Griffin III's surgically repaired right knee, are taking a cautious approach in training camp, limiting Griffin to positional work and seven-on-seven drills; Griffin says goal is for him to be on the field when team plays their season opener.

headline.main: Cautious Redskins Force an Eager Griffin Into a Waiting Game
headline.print_headline: Cautious Redskins Force an Eager Griffin Into a Waiting Game

docs.snippet: Entering training camp, the rookie cornerback Dee Milliner is expected to compete for a starting spot alongside Antonio Cromartie....
docs.lead_paragraph: Entering training camp, the rookie cornerback Dee Milliner is expected to compete for a starting spot alongside Antonio Cromartie.
docs.abstract: New York Jets rookie cornerback Dee Milliner is expected to compete with Kyle Wilson for, and ultimately claim, starting spot opposite cornerback Antonio Cromartie that was vacated when team dealt Darrelle Revis to Tampa Bay Buccaneers four days before the NFL draft.

headline.main: Milliner Ready to Join Jets Camp After Ending a Weeklong Holdout
headline.print_headline: Milliner Ready to Join Jets Camp After Ending a Weeklong Holdout

docs.snippet: To avoid unnecessary injuries as a result of contact, Carolina has been emphasizing form tackling during team drills, with defenders wrapping up ball carriers but not taking them down....
docs.lead_paragraph: To avoid unnecessary injuries as a result of contact, Carolina has been emphasizing form tackling during team drills, with defenders wrapping up ball carriers but not taking them down.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; Carolina Panthers are doing their best to limit tackling during training camp in effort to avoid unnecessary injuries; other NFL news noted.

headline.main: Panthers Doing Best to Limit Tackling
headline.print_headline: Panthers Doing Best To Limit Tackling

docs.snippet: Mike McQueary, a former Penn State assistant, said that the longtime football coach Joe Paterno told him the university mishandled its response to the Jerry Sandusky child sexual abuse scandal....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mike McQueary, a former Penn State assistant, said that the longtime football coach Joe Paterno told him the university mishandled its response to the Jerry Sandusky child sexual abuse scandal.
docs.abstract: Former Penn State assistant football coach Mike McQueary testifies in hearing for three former officials accused in covering up Jerry Sandusky's crimes, saying that longtime coach Joe Paterno told him the university mishandled its response to the child sexual abuse scandal.

headline.main: Witness Testifies That Paterno Said Penn State Erred on Sandusky

docs.snippet: Russia's deputy prime minister criticised state-controlled airline Aeroflot's sponsorship of  football club Manchester United on Tuesday, saying it appeared to show the firm favoured international over domestic interests....

docs.snippet: Former Penn State officials accused of covering up Jerry Sandusky's child sexual abuse return to court on Tuesday, a day after a key witness recalled legendary coach Joe Paterno criticizing their handling of the case....
